M2 Coursework documentation
===========================

This documentation contains modules and scripts used in the LoRA adaptation of Qwen2.5 for time series forecasting.
All code is documented with docstrings and organized for reproducibility and clarity.



.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Documentation:

   autoapi/index
